type.description: Choose display mode of Alert message

cta.display_name: Add call-to-action link or link button

isMinimal.description: "Minimal" card style has no padding around content and no drop shadow/border around card.

headingLevel.display_name: Heading level for the headline (default is H3)

borderColor.display_name: Border color (for round image option only)

all_presets.name: Minimal, large image, left aligned content

cta.display_name: Add call-to-action link or link button

isMinimal.description: "Minimal" card style has no padding around content and no drop shadow/border around card.

headingLevel.display_name: Heading level for the headline (default is H3)

borderColor.display_name: Border color (for round image option only)

isAnkleTitleSrOnly.display_name: Make ankle title screen reader only (not visible)

sectionMenu.display_name: Pick the section menu for this page

sidebar.display_name: Left sidebar content (displays below the section menu)

belowContent.display_name: Below content (this region goes below the main content/sidebar)

title.description: Also displayed in the browser tab with " | Stanford Alumni" added automatically after.

isSrOnlyTitle.display_name: Only check this if a Hero banner is present. Make page title screen reader only (not visible)

content.display_name: Content area (this region is next to the sidebar for pages with a sidebar; add your WYSIWYG content here)

aboveContent.display_name: Above content (this region goes below the page title but above the main content/sidebar)

srText.display_name: Optional screen reader only text (not visible)

rel.description: Enter all values separated by an empty space, e.g., nofollow noopener

all_presets.name: Secondary (gradient outline) button, for light background
Secondary (red outline) button, for light background

headingLevel.display_name: Heading level for the headline (default is H3)

srText.description: This text will be read out by screen readers after the visible text.
srText.display_name: Optional screen reader only text (not visible)

leadingIcon.description: Add an optional FontAwesome icon in front of the link. See link for list of icons available: https://fontawesome.com/v5.15/icons?d=gallery&p=2&s=brands,regular,solid&v=5.0.0,5.0.1,5.0.2,5.0.3,5.0.4,5.0.5,5.0.6,5.0.7,5.0.8,5.0.9&m=free

isOutlineFaIcon.display_name: Use outline style for leading icon (not available for all icons)

srText.display_name: Optional screen reader only text (not visible)
srText.description: This text will be read out by screen readers after the visible text.

rel.description: Enter all values separated by an empty space, e.g., nofollow noopener

all_presets.name: With leading FontAwesome icon, white link (for dark background)

isAnkleTitleSrOnly.display_name: Make ankle title screen reader only (not visible)

title.description: Also displayed in the browser tab with " | Stanford Alumni" added automatically after.

isSrOnlyTitle.display_name: Make page title screen reader only (not visible)

content.display_name: Content area (this region is next to the sidebar for pages with a sidebar; add your WYSIWYG content here)

aboveContent.display_name: Above content (this region goes below the page title but above the main content/sidebar)

belowContent.display_name: Below content (this region goes below the main content/sidebar)

embed.description: Paste your script code including the script tags. Use this field when your script tag has a body and not just an src attribute

videoWidth.description: Choose "Fit Parent Container" option for when nesting video within a Row component with 2 or 3 columns. The video will fill the width of the column.

aspectRatio.description: Most common aspect ratio for modern videos is 16:9. Some older videos might have aspect ratio 4:3 instead.

videoUrl.description: URL to the YouTube or Vimeo video, e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0qHWub21h5c

location.description: E.g., Cardinal Hall Conference Room, Zoom, Live streaming

imageFocus.description: If your uploaded image already has an aspect ratio of 3x2, then no need to touch this option.

tabText.description: Anything entered in this field will replace the default "Event" text on the tab label.

headingLevel.display_name: Heading level of the event title (default is H3)

components.name: grid

numCol.display_name: Number of items in a row

width.description: General width recommendations: For 3 cards in a row, use 12 of 12 columns; for 2 cards in a row, use either 10 or 8 of 12 columns; for 1 card in a row, use either 6 or 4 columns.

isMdLgOneColumn.display_name: Use 1-column grid for MD and LG breakpoints

isStretchItems.display_name: Force items in a row to have same height

gapWidth.description: Use "Large" when placing minimal cards in a grid so they are slightly further apart.

components.preview_tmpl:
Number of items in a row: {{numCol}}
Width of the grid: {{width}} of 12 columns

fontSize.description: Select "Default" to use default font size for selected heading level.

isDarkGradient.display_name: Use darker gradient (if background image is bright)

all_presets.name: Interior page Hero, small headline, no CTA

isOutline.description: Note: Not all icons have outline style available. If outline style is not available for an icon, it will not show up in the preview.

endDate.display_name: End Day (No need to enter if same as start day)

linkList.display_name: Link list (Click "Add block" to add link items)

linkGroups.display_name: Link groups (each with a heading and a list of links)

localFooter.display_name: Select Local Footer to display for this page

parentTextSecond.display_name: Parent text 2nd line (wrap to next line on smaller screens)

link.description: Choose "Url" if you want to add an external link.

utilityNav.display_name: Utility menu (displayed at the top of the masthead next to the search bar)

link.description: Choose "Url" if you want to add an external link.

partnerName.description: Name of partner (i.e. Geico, Stanford University Libraries, etc)

name.description: Add a name for easy findability. This field does not display.

title.description: This is the headline for the Perk, e.g. "Enjoy discounts of 20% with Geico"

perkType.description: Is this benefit only available to members?

descriptionShort.description: This is a short description that will be used on Perk Cards and other locations that call for short text.

descriptionLong.description: Long description of the Perk. This displays on the individual Perk page.

isNew.description: A "New" label will be added to the card view of this perk if this option is checked.

topic.description: What topic(s) apply to this perk or benefit? NOTE: this field is not in use at this time.

isFeatured.description: Should this perk be featured in a sortable list? You can feature perks on a page using a card. Note: this field is not currently implemented.

weight.description: Use this field to rank order the perks for sorting. Note: this is not currently in use. The default value is 5.

localFooter.description: Select Local Footer to display for this page

cardUrl.description: Enter the URL where you would like the card for this Perk to go (i.e. the PGNet page with promo codes, an external partner site, an internal homesite page, a Stanford website.)

cardGroupTitle.description: This editor-only option is for adding a title for this group of Perk Cards which makes the Storyblok preview easier to understand. This title won't show up on the website.
cardGroupTitle.display_name: Title for this group of cards (for Storyblok preview)

text.description: This is the text field for the poster. The unordered list is only designed to work with left-aligned text. Please do not put a list in a centered text area.

bgImageGroup.display_name: Background image (optional, expand to select image and option)

bgImage.display_name: Background image (optional, comes with gradient overlay)

vCrop.description: Select vertical background image focus if its aspect ratio is taller than the poster aspect ratio.

options.name: Image and text in 1 column, center-aligned content
Image on the left, left-aligned content

headingLevel.display_name: Heading level for the headline (default is H2)

borderColor.display_name: Border color (for round image option only)

id.display_name: Optional unique ID (for use with anchor links)
id.description: Letters, numbers, hyphen and underscores only. Must be unique for the page it is on, ie, no 2 WYSIWYGs or sections should have the same id's.

all_presets.name: Black background, left-aligned, default font sizes.
Light grey background, center-aligned, large font sizes
Poster with background image and dark gradient overlay

enabled.description: Use this to turn on/off this Redirect

body.description: Short one-paragraph excerpt or description to show in search results card.

date.description: Date so that we can use this to sort by relevancy in the future

keywords.description: Enter keywords or phrases, separated by a comma.

maxPagerLinks.description: Maximum number of page links to show in pager. If number of pages exceeds this, an ellipsis will be shown.

maxPagerLinksMobile.description: Maximum number of page links to show in pager on mobile breakpoints. If number of pages exceeds this, an ellipsis will be shown.

emptySearchMessage.description: Text that is displayed when no search term was entered
emptySearchMessage.default_value: Uh oh, it looks like nothing was submitted. Please enter your search terms above and hit enter or click the search icon.

noResultsHeading.description:
Heading to be displayed when query returns no results.
Available tokens: [query]

noResultsBody.description:
Message to be displayed when query returns no results.
Available Tokens: [query]

noResultsAdditionalContent.description: Additional content to be displayed when query returns no results. (For example, Popular topic links)

introduction.description: The text above the search input field
introduction.default_value: Hello, what can we help you find today?

emptySearchMessage.default_value: Uh oh, it looks like nothing was submitted. Please enter your search terms above and hit enter or click the search icon.
emptySearchMessage.description: Text that is displayed when no search term was entered

isLeftAlign.description: Horizontal alignment for section title, superheadline link and intro. Default is center alignment. Check for left alignment.

isLessHeaderSpacing.display_name: Decrease spacing between section header and content

isSrOnlyTitle.display_name: Make section title screen reader only (non-visible)

headingLevel.display_name: Heading level for the title (default is H2)

id.display_name: Unique section ID (optional, for anchor links)
id.description: Letters, numbers, hyphen and underscores only. Must be unique for the page it is on, ie, no 2 WYSIWYGs, sections or posters should have the same id's.

all_presets.name: Section with 2 minimal basic cards, center-aligned

image.description: Click on the image url above to add alt text and title.

isBanner.description: Fit Parent Container must be selected in order to utilize this option. This gives the banner a max height.
isBanner.display_name: Use banner style (only available for "Fit Parent Container" width)?

imageFocus.description: If banner style is enabled, select an image focus point. Default image focus is center.

caption.display_name: Caption (this field allows for longer caption with some rich text formatting)

isCaptionCenter.description: If Fit Parent Container is selected, caption can be adjusted to full width or center container aligned.
isCaptionCenter.display_name: If "Fit Parent Container" width is selected, add spacing between caption and container edge

isAnkleTitleSrOnly.display_name: Make ankle title screen reader only (not visible)

manualDate.description: The text entered here overrides the date picker "Published date" field above.
manualDate.display_name: Manually entered published date (if exact date is not known)

imageFocus.display_name: Image focus (only for edge-to-edge hero image)

shortTitle.description: If not provided, the story title will be used instead.

teaser.description: If not provided, the story intro/subheading will be used instead.

cardImage.description: If not provided, the story hero image will be used instead.

isBigText.display_name: Make headline and teaser font larger

hideImage.display_name: Hide card image and tab label

cardTitle.description: This editor-only option is for adding a title for this group of Perk Cards which makes the Storyblok preview easier to understand. This title won't show up on the website.
cardTitle.display_name: Headline for this story card (for Storyblok preview)

cardTitle.description: Set to override the trip title when displayed as a Card

cardSubtitle.description: Set to override the trip subtitle when displayed as a Card

cardDescription.description: Set to override the trip short description when displayed as a Card

noindex.description: Enable to remove from Algolia and search engine indexing

cardImage.description: Set to override the trip hero image when displayed as a Card

primaryFilter.description: Select a primary filter type and value to pre-filter trips available for filtering on this page.

aboveContent.description: Content to appear above the the trip filter section

belowContent.description: Content to appear below the trip filter area

isLightText.display_name: Use light text (for use on dark backgrounds)

id.display_name: Optional unique id (for use with anchor links)
id.description: Letters, numbers, hyphen and underscores only. Must be unique for the page it is on, ie, no 2 WYSIWYGs or sections should have the same id's. Note: do not use "page-title" or "main-content" as your ID.
